pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks with Sadiq Khan, Mayor of London in the United Kingdom | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml: The Prime Minister spoke today with Sadiq Khan, the Mayor of London in the United Kingdom. The Prime Minister conveyed the condolences of Canada for the recent terrorist attack in London and the Mayor expressed his sorrow at the loss of Canadian Christine Archibald during this attack. Both the Mayor and the Prime Minister recognized the importance of countering violent extremism and the Mayor thanked the Prime Minister for Canada's support throughout this tragic period.
